lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in a sustainable way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to appreciate and learn about the land and themselves by helping them to experience the wilderness.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I loan because of Moopups. He was a loner who quietly changed many lives, without even knowing he was doing so. If he were still here, he would be making loans through Kiva.  Since he is not here, I loan in his memory.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I needed help for education and raise my children and I want to show my gratitude to those who helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I play and work with fiber - wool, yarn, silk, etc. - to create fashion accessories.

lenders.name: Marte
lenders.loan_because: it is is practical way to partner with women all around the world and to empower families and communities through these bold women.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Makes me feel good
lenders.occupational_info: Provide people with a vision of financial independence.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: compared to some, work is not an appropriate description.

lenders.name: Annabelle and Daniel
lenders.loan_because: we are lucky to have all of the things that we have, and there are a lot of people out there who need this money more than we do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both full time college students.

lenders.name: Rosena
lenders.loan_because: a small amount can make such a huge difference!

lenders.name: Sarala
lenders.loan_because: Better question...why not?

lenders.name: Asko
lenders.loan_because: Even the little I give may be someone's big break.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people access their government through the internet.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: it's important to give back to our world economy. I believe everyone should be able to pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell men's jewelry and accessories to people all over the world.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: I have seen how much impact a small amount of money can make - and the structure of Kiva makes it more likely the money will be used appropriately by the entrepreneur.  I travel often to Uganda and may be able to meet some of the entrepreneurs I'm lending to... and I'm especially keen to support women who often are left with the responsibility for raising the children when husbands die or otherwise leave the family.
lenders.occupational_info: I do public health research on HIV/AIDS in Africa, mostly Uganda.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.occupational_info: I help determine the right price to charge for insurance.

lenders.name: ThomasEconClasses
lenders.occupational_info: We are students. We seek to understand how the world economy works. We also wish to participate in this economy. We do so here, as mini-venture capitalists.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: "This is how we know what love is. Jesus Christ laid down his life for us, and so we should lay down our lives for our brothers" 1 John 3:16.

lenders.name: xiaobo
lenders.loan_because: no pain,no gain. Many peoples  need some help for the sake of  alleviating poverty. So I think  I shall  doing someting.
lenders.occupational_info: business of  communicate instrument

lenders.name: Bijan
lenders.loan_because: I personally know the reality of development aid and have been to some of the countries I lend to. Kiva is the most effective way to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Project Manager in Development Aid, specialising in knowledge management and ICT4Dev.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.occupation: Office Manager for a small non-profit
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I do the paperwork for a volunteer organization that teaches people outdoor recreation skills.

lenders.name: Yudi
lenders.loan_because: I want plant jackbean for 20 ha land

lenders.name: Tessie & Philip
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people who need microloans
lenders.occupational_info: I teach ethics

lenders.name: Karim
lenders.loan_because: if I was one of the people asking for a loan, I would be happy to have some people trusting me and helping me out.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I know I can change peoples lives without even spending money. I am just that cool!!!

lenders.name: YVES RENÉ PRIMEAU
lenders.loan_because: SUPPORT CREATIVITY AND SEL-RELIANCE
lenders.occupational_info: HELP PEOPLE RECONNECTING TO THERE ORIGINAL LIFE ENERGY

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. This is a very personal and tangible way of supporting small scale enterprises and developments that can have a direct impact on the wellbeing of the families involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a midwife and a nurse. I worked in the NHS for 35 years and have just started my own consultancy. I understand the struggle of starting a new business, but in England there is lots of support available. This is my way of supporting those in more difficult economies to also realise their ambitions.

lenders.name: Achim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea and I hope it changes some lives for the better

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: Splendid idea
lenders.occupational_info: IT development

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because:
We as human beings are the ones on this earth responsible for creating and manifesting everything that is going on in our world today! There is and there can be enough for everyone - no one deserves or should go through difficult times, for we as human beings are responsible for allowing the humanitarian problems in the world to still continue. Corrupt systems, that keeps us humans enslaved....sick, hungry for power & money, while the real problems/issues are being ignored. We have to stop and stand up/ change our ways - as within, so without - re-create a better world for all humans/ children and start taking responsibility for ourselves and for our world! 

“In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of! In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of!” ~Confucius~

A leader is best when people barely know he exists, not so good when people obey and acclaim him, worse when they despise him....But of a good leader who talks little when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say, "We did it ourselves.
~Lao Tzu~

lenders.name: Alexis Lauzon
lenders.loan_because: This may be the only process that can support entrepreneurs in these countries to bring a new change in their business and life.
lenders.occupational_info: "The good times of today are the sad thoughts of tomorrow"- bob marley

lenders.name: Muhammad Atif Ali
lenders.loan_because: I have a business trading in commuditities.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: Allah has blessed me and i want to share with those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Martin Scott
lenders.loan_because: It's cool, it helps people, and it improves my karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I help write computer programs that allow companies to display information in the Internet.

lenders.name: Elizabeth H. Ojai, CA
lenders.loan_because: My children gave me $50 to loan for my 50th birthday, I wanted to loan to someone with children. I will continue loaning with Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I develop office product  for an online store for my employer. For a hobby I have a big garden, chickens, rabbits and dogs.

lenders.name: Autumn
lenders.loan_because: There is not enough compassion and camaraderie in the world.  We're all part of one great community, and I love that Kiva offers me an opportunity to reach out to people across the globe in making a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help people with stress and trauma related conditions including insomnia. I have specialized training in a naturalistic stress and trauma healing method called Somatic Experiencing. This is a body centered way of gently releasing tension and stress. For sleep issues I work with individuals over a series of one-on-one sessions based on cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia, CBT-I.  Sometimes I offer classes for general information on sleep and stress relief.

I am in Waldorf Early Childhood education in hopes of bringing my skills to youngsters and thier families.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: Everything I have came from someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer programs and sell them to businesses.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: andrew
lenders.loan_because: I really want to try and save some money over the next few years and while i'm saving, I like to think it really helps someone else in the world, So thanks for helping me.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to build houses

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I have 25% North Vietnamese heritage, 75% French, born in France in 1944, now living in the Pocono mountains of Pennsylvania, USA.  I want to participate in lifestyle improvement for those still living where my grandmother came from.

lenders.name: Samantha & Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Small Business Development

lenders.name: Paul Fairley
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to empower the economic independence of women in the developing world.

lenders.name: A.J. Smith
lenders.loan_because: I believe grass roots, individual-to-individual, economic solutions are likely far superior to major, sweeping programs administered by large organizations.  What a wonderful way to participate in changing lives through microcredit.

lenders.name: matt
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Chadron
lenders.loan_because: we are a philanthropic club always looking for a way to serve above self.
lenders.occupational_info: Rotary Club is an international business club made of members who want to serve above themselves.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I want my children to understand the importance of giving to others everytime they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish language and culture at the college level.

lenders.name: LG
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people helping themselves. When these entrepreneurs have repaid their loans I can let someone else use the money! In this way more people can be helped to raise themselves out of poverty  to a better life.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: It's my way to give back...
lenders.occupational_info: I try to create music and share it with the world.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the little guy. He is the one that makes the world turn.
lenders.occupational_info: I create indoor comfort

lenders.name: EPO TH 13th floor
lenders.loan_because: We believe in this way of helping people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: We promote prosperity across Europe, and thanks to Kiva now also beyond...

lenders.name: Mulder Family
lenders.occupational_info:
Chad works as a marketer.
Jodi is a part-time clinical social worker.
Levi plays & sings.
Judah is learning how to walk.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs succeed.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want an investment that helps the world to be a better place
lenders.occupational_info: Texile manufacturing - management

lenders.name: Farzad
lenders.loan_because: I do this on behalf of my new baby boy. In a few years when my son is old enough to understand I want to use Kiva to teach him about helping others.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I care, and because it hurts to see the chasm between the way we live and the way people in developing countries are forced to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work for money any more. I had a computer software and consultancy company that I sold to some mad Americans who paid me enough money I don't need to work for a living any more. So I went back to University and am now researching a Ph.D.

lenders.name: rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I have a very blessed life and want to share some of my good fortune to others who otherwise would not get the chance to succeed.  Everyone deserves a chance to be happy and feel worthy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a CAT scan technologist.  I take specialized x-rays of people.  My work keeps me grounded because everyday I see people who are very sick and still stay upbeat about life.  How could I not feel fortunate and blessed?

lenders.name: liquid
lenders.loan_because: money's just another word for nothing left to lose

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: It's my need to support, especially people in Africa.

lenders.name: adriana
lenders.loan_because: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, "What are you doing for others?"- Martin Luther King, Jr.
lenders.occupational_info: Shaping the lives of young children.

lenders.name: simi
lenders.loan_because: its simple... I CAN...

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Publisher of printed editions of classical choral, vocal, and keyboard music

lenders.name: Maranda
lenders.occupational_info: I go to Brevard College in hopes of becoming a painter.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to. It's so little money and time, there's no excuse not to!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a student, but my goal is to graduate and work for a non-profit organization - hopefully doing some sort of humanitarian effort/disaster relief.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: We feel it is important to help others.  We love the Lord.  He commands that we care for the less fortunate.  A hand-up is far better than a hand-out!

lenders.name: Marcy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help anyone who is willing to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I help train people to do their jobs better.

lenders.name: Aleara
lenders.loan_because: I care and I want to help other people.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in redistributing the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people turn their good intentions into action, by connecting people, ideas and resources. See idealist.org for more.

lenders.name: Fortunate Family
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children and raise them and take care of the house.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.occupational_info: Food writer and founder of nonprofit Drop In & Decorate: Cookies for Donation program.

lenders.name: Yolanta
lenders.loan_because: it's one of a very few direct options to help people less of....I hope that I can make small diffrence to somebody's life.

lenders.name: Murali
lenders.loan_because: I want more people in the world to have a better quality of life

lenders.name: Neighborhood Book Club
lenders.loan_because: we are a book club in New Jersey and we want to do something to make a difference in the world...even if just a bit.
lenders.occupational_info: we are a group of mostly mothers in ages ranging from 35 to 50ish and we read and talk about interesting books every month and were hoping to do something bigger than just talk about books.

lenders.name: Atterboms
lenders.loan_because: this is just an excellent idea!!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to help people improve their lives and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I review articles that will be published in medical journals.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: In my experience, there are a great deal of problems with traditional charity. External 'solutions' rarely are sustainable. Whereas Kiva gives them tools to improve their own lives as they see fit.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to everyday people on behalf of companies. I also help make sense of their customers' needs. They then go away and, hopefully, improve their stuff to make customers happy.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: By caring for one another, the world's people become closer and the artificial walls we erect crumble. I have much, and so many others have so little; it is my way of paying it forward for a blessed life.

lenders.name: Mikaela
lenders.loan_because: I know that small acts can make a big difference.  Giving someone that jump start they need can work miracles and foster an entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people that have been hurt by other people.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I can and it feels good. Thanks Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a citizen of the developed world, a world which is wasteful, myopic, and greedy, who is trying to change that a little bit at a time.

lenders.name: Angelo
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying photography at a college in Virginia Beach, VA.

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: My grandma gave me a gift certificate

lenders.name: Kimihiko
lenders.loan_because: I want to help children go to school.

lenders.name: Cecil
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Kentucky I am studying Sustainable Agriculture, Community Development and leadership and Minoring in Agriculture Economics and Animal Science.

lenders.name: Georgia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves to fulfilling lives.  We all need a little help now and then.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds from corporations and foundations in support of educational research and scholarships, as well as other projects for faculty and students at the university.

lenders.name: LifeCoach Aps
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we, as world citizens, all have a joint responsibility for improving each others physical and spiritual living conditions. We really like the idea of having a direct insight in what our donations are spent on and that we can support the projects that in our opinion has the largest impact and the greatest chance of succeeding in terms of improving living conditions for the recipients and their families in generations to come.

lenders.name: Clem
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get the best deal on the things they need.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Deut. 15:7-8, seems to sum it up.  We have been very blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I design electronic and computer systems, and provide consulting services to companies and organizations that do not have expertise on their staff.

lenders.name: 1st.Presbyterian Church
lenders.loan_because: Jesus told us to love our neighbors
lenders.occupational_info: We're members of a Christian church

lenders.name: Jim & Diane
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people better themselves.

lenders.name: Nate & Jen
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small business
lenders.occupational_info: We make high-quality, natural soap. Our unrefined shea butter comes from Ghana so we especially like to support their local economies.

lenders.name: Jollean
lenders.loan_because: The universe wants us to look after one another, no matter where we come from! We are all connected and this world is not so big when you think about the human experience. So I'm happy to help in this way -- I think Kiva is brilliant and wish everyone would retain an account.
lenders.occupational_info: Whatever I do, I look to be creative!

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: I was able to start my business with a the help of government program and it has allowed me to make significant changes in my life.  I believe that  through nurturing and with the proper resources to guide us, we are all able to overcome hardship and thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook healthy food for people who don't have the time or the energy to do so for themselves.

lenders.name: Gail and Andy
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help each other when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Gail is a creative person who plays the guitar, composes folk songs, makes beadwork, and loves photography and writing. Andy is an elected politician with a passion for helping people and changing the world for the better.

lenders.name: Christian City Church
lenders.loan_because: KIVA actions what we hold as part of our vision that a church can make a real difference in helping people build great futures.
lenders.occupational_info: Community oriented church that is guided by the biblical principle of loving God equals loving people in practical ways.

lenders.name: The Garling Clan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves and their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I plan meetings, events and conventions for a resort hotel

lenders.name: Gerard and Eva
lenders.loan_because: We have so much and so many have so little. This is a great way to help people who really need it.
lenders.occupational_info: Gerard grows blueberries and Eva delivers babies.

lenders.name: Henry Wheatley
lenders.loan_because: I believe small businesses are an important path out of extreme poverty and I know small loans can play an essential role in helping small entrepreneurs succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Varied real estate investment plus investment in securities and service on the board of a U.S. public company.  I worked in the '60s as a US Peace Corps country director in Africa and South America.

lenders.name: Hung
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have a better life than many people, especially in other countries. Just want to do my small part to help others to have a better life, getting out of poverty so their children can go to school. Plus It feels really good.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I hope it help someone live a little better life that comes from a tiny bit of help from me and a large part through their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I support Operations of a distribution center by maintaining the IT infrastructure

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: i want to make a difference

lenders.name: Point Loma Nazarene
lenders.loan_because: Christ calls us to serve "the least of these".  We want to use the resources and capabilities that we have to be of the most assistance to the working poor that have the capability of becoming empowered and raising themselves up out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of interested and inspired students!

lenders.name: china
lenders.loan_because: To help others with their business ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: Creating ads and materials for other businesses.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: it expands my world. I find it very gratifying to be able to help in such a tangible and direct way. As soon as my kids are old enough to read I will create accounts for them so they can learn about people across the globe and begin to know what it feels like to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I test filters to make sure they are removing bacteria like they are supposed to.

lenders.name: Roan
lenders.loan_because: because I want people to be able to make a living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who is who is taught at home by my parents.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I am a firm believer that little amounts of sharing could save the world, if only we'd just reach out and do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now, I have a pretty universal job. I am raising my daughter, helping her to learn and love. She inspires me every day to think about the future, and I try just to keep each day full of wonder for her.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed - and because this is one thing that we can all do to help offset the the unfair distribution of resources in our world... at least a little bit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies market and grow their business.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay at home mum to three.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We should all care for one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and resell antiques

lenders.name: matt
lenders.occupational_info: design, drafting & project manage construction of houses, apartment & commercial buildings

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: People come to me with ideas and I help them create companies and comply with our country's law.  After their company is formed, I help the company get money/financing from other individuals and organizations so they can nurture their ideas and watch them grow.

lenders.loan_because: i can only loan through my work, through my camera, through my media,  if u need
lenders.occupational_info: im working as a Producer Current Affairs at Pakistan Television Corporation,  a govt. tv channel in pakistan. my work is to digout the realities from the society highlighting the problems of civil society and poor peoples at grassroot level.

lenders.name: Kasia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand from time to time.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant concept, one I have often heard about and not found a way to participate in. Who needs interest from a bank when you know how much you can "get back" from investing in such businesses?

lenders.name: sunganani
lenders.loan_because: I do not loan out money. I try to provide a little something to someone get by *(^_^)* Everything can be done, but we going to have to do it!!
lenders.occupational_info: Work hard to see that one day all necessities of life "food, shelter, clothing" are free for all to use.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I want to see other people who have not had the same chances as I, do well for themselves and free themselves from poverty

lenders.occupational_info: I am planing to export europian proudation to my country in Assia.

lenders.loan_because: it just feels good to help others! What I love about Kiva is that is is offering not just a hand out, but a hand "up" to other entrepreneurs throughout the globe.

lenders.name: Rick and Aggie
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: being a poor student for so long has shown me how little can go very far.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance makes a real difference!

lenders.name: ODonnell

lenders.name: Maelynn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.

lenders.name: Dana

lenders.occupational_info: I look for unfilled niches in the marketplace, and I find ways to fill them while earning a modest profit.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help those less fortunate than myself, and also to remind myself that whatever challenges I may face, there are those who face worse challeges everyday, and overcome.  Until poverty is eliminated, we can never truly succeed as a global community.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe kivas are the best way to improve the lives of others. And I can witness how my investment helps others achieve their success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who manages the prosecution of child abuse and juvenile delinquency cases. We intervene in the lives of children so they can have successful futures as adults.

lenders.name: Ferne
lenders.loan_because: it helps others
lenders.occupational_info: I help to administer the paying of pensions and survivor benefits to members who work for the federal government and their families.

lenders.name: Leonardo
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jera
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission. Microfinance will not lift everyone out of poverty, but I am sure it has helped many. I want to help improve life opportunities for people throughout the world. I am a blessed individual and if I don't do something, then I would feel like a horrible human being.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying law at Washington University. I hope to work on social equity issues in the USA and women's economic progress issues in North Africa. I want to earn a PhD in Economics, too, and become a professor of law and economics, but I hope to start a a niche legal and consulting firm later on.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance to realize their dreams and ambitions, I feel that seeing a goal accomplished is one of the best feelings a person can have.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Graphic Designer, I usually design things like brochures, presentations, logos, and packaging with a focus on small and new businesses.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team that supports a global order processing system.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it's a cool way to share what I have with people who need a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day and wish i was out in the world making more of a difference.

lenders.name: alex
lenders.loan_because: I want to give those less fortunate a chance to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Web Designer in Toronto.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: one day, it may be myself in need..

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is good to see people trying to make something of themselves and not simply wanting a handout.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for an international steamship line, importing and exporting shipping containers.

I am also an elected official. President of the Board of Directors of a local fresh water supply district.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: These small loans can be extremely helpful in very poor countries to assist people in getting out of the economic poverty cycle.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a senior citizen apartment complex.

lenders.name: Hypopig
lenders.loan_because: the loans won't loan themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I....make....the....picture....on....the....computer....

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small entrepreneurs create good economies and good economies help to overcome poverty and hunger.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to make a difference in the world and I love supporting entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Margie
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to take care of my beautiful twin daughters who were born April 2007.

lenders.name: Jones Family
lenders.loan_because: We would like to make a positive change in someone's life.

lenders.name: Indigo Bath & Body
lenders.loan_because: I created Indigo from my own love of natural products and things grown in my own garden.  By loaning to others who are starting their business, it gives me the opportunity to help someone achieve their own dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Indigo is a woman owned business, creating handmade soap and bath products from scratch, using only the best from mother nature.  By supporting Indigo Bath & Body, you're supporting a family run business who cares about their products and customers.

lenders.name: johnnie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Make custom silver jewelry.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky in life and feel it is time to give a little back
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my company's money

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: It's interesting to see the diverse occupations people have around the world, and exciting to be able to contribute to their successes.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people realize their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I transfer inventory between warehouses in the U.S. and Canada.

lenders.name: Ana Nimos
lenders.loan_because: Humanity's Sake

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I love supporting entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: I started a small, online retail handbag company because I hated just being an attorney.  It didn't work, now I am starting another business to help the environment.

lenders.name: Bryon
lenders.occupational_info: I work with small business owners to help them with their accounting needs.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a sense of a world community - and I don't need to spend my money on another possession.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
Luke 12:48
To whom much is given, much will be expected.

lenders.name: Veit
lenders.loan_because: Support ideas, share success, turn for a better world

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: God's grace and mercy have been with me.  People with big hearts gave to me and my children when we needed a home and food.  Now that we have everything we need, it's my turn to extend a loving hand.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it is the compassionate thing to do and we can all use help now and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a newly-graduated librarian hoping to work with underserved people in the United States' Southwest.

lenders.name: Hansai
lenders.occupational_info: IT consultant by day, massage therapist on weekends.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: it is an excellent opportunity to help those less fortunate than myself in developing parts of the world with little risk.  While there are other sites which wil make a return, the point of this isn't as an investment to make profit, but an investment to facilitate change.
lenders.occupational_info: I sing.

lenders.name: Erik & Saskia
lenders.loan_because: To speak with Audrey Hepburn: "I'm filled with a rage at ourselves. I don't believe in collective guilt, but I do believe in collective responsibility."

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I do not have very much, but I guess it is a king's ransom is the greater scheme of things. Every day I feel helpless to "do more", and Kiva allows me to help and see tangible results without having a lot to give.
lenders.occupational_info: working with computers

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to positively affect other people.

lenders.name: Halli
lenders.occupational_info: I study Lyme disease

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Great way to help some people.
lenders.occupational_info: Finance

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me, so I must share my blessing with those that need help.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I love that I can impact individuals directly who do not have access to traditional funding sources.  The fact that this is a "hand up, not a hand out," "teach a man to fish" type of program is really exciting - when my money comes back it can be used as capital again to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a corporate attorney working at a large law firm.  Most of my work consists of helping business owners here in the U.S. raise money through investors, usually hundreds of thousands or millions of dollars.  Microlending  allows me to do the same for people who are not wealthy individuals or successful business owners.

lenders.name: Khadijah
lenders.loan_because: We must become the change we want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the communications field.

lenders.name: Tiffany and Ben
lenders.loan_because: We would like to make a difference, however small, in the hopes that we can make someone else's life a little better and a little brighter. We believe in generosity and kindness, and feel that there is too little of it in the world today.  Gandhi said it best: "be the change you want to see in the world."

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I get a sense of knowing exactly what my money is going to in order to help somebody else and gives a small feeling of doing something good in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications company working on their servers (large computers).  I fix problems and implement new solutions.

lenders.name: Hogggatt Family
lenders.loan_because: People are capable of great things when given the opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: We work with individuals with disability and in the foster care system in order to provide the resources and supports needed to be successful

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I am a very fortunate person.  I was loaned money so that I may become a lawyer.  I am currently repaying my debts but have a little extra to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I feel that I wouldn't be doing my education justice if I didn't help others.

lenders.name: joshua
lenders.loan_because: I believe this concept will help shape the opportunity of the poor into being more creative and not just settling for droppings off a table.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investor. I like to invest in people and community's of the poor, local and abroad. With my return coming from a much greater source.

lenders.name: Autumn
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good!  My life is so blessed and I wish to pass my blessings onward.

lenders.name: vulcanjedi
lenders.loan_because: I am not sure but it seems to be the right thing to do and I believe what goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in IT for 25 years. Computers are my hobby and webpages and video games are for fun.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I can't afford to give a lot, but on my journey through life and work a lot of people gave me a small helping hand that made a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find new jobs.

lenders.name: Keri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the good in people.  If I give to someone to make their life better I know mine will be better.  I wish I could give more to help more but I do what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I audit for a small company in Tennessee.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I like to be able to assist people with improving the life of themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: International Freight Services

lenders.name: Gosia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of all the technology at a school.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Curiosity driven.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: Just want to help people.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: spite
lenders.occupational_info: I use words to change people's lives.

lenders.name: ian
lenders.loan_because:
"The time has come,
To talk of many things:
Of shoes—and ships—and sealing-wax—
Of cabbages—and kings—
And why the sea is boiling hot—
And whether pigs have wings."
lenders.occupational_info: The world is full of magic. Ancient, deep seated magic.

lenders.name: Raminder
lenders.loan_because: I couldn't save the world as I had intended so maybe I can lend a small hand :-)
lenders.occupational_info: Selling technology hardware/software to everyone...

lenders.name: Mercedes
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if people have a dream and a will to do better in life that they can. Sometimes we need people to help us not everyhting is under our control. I am helping Peruvians right now because I was born in Piura, Peru and many people helped me to be who I am now.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as a systems engineer. I do simulations to design, verify and validate radar systems.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It order to keep what I have, I must give it away. Besides, I want to do something for somebody else for a change. When I really needed help someone was kind enough to help me, no questions asked. I will forever be grateful for that. One person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a local TV station. I provide all aspects of computer support.

lenders.name: Ericka
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference by giving hope.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: Although I'm not rich, I know that there is always something to be done to help others. Through volunteer work and donations to charities I strive to make the world a better place. I know that my money helps someone through a tough time and that it continues to help them get a leg up in a difficult economy. I'm proud to be able to help those struggling by providing them the assistance they need to become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a small restaurant while I work nights to finish my PhD in German.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the resources with which I have been blessed and I want to make a tangible difference in the lives of women across the world.  I also want to set an example to my children and others that one person CAN make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother working hard to raise my children to be wise, responsible, caring world citizens.

lenders.name: Mario
lenders.loan_because: There are those that need more than I do.  Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide technology solutions.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully I can help somebody get ahead in their life.  It's the right thing to do and it will only help to make our planet a better place to live.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because:
In nothing do men approach so nearly to the gods as in doing good to men. 
~ Cicero

lenders.name: Diederik
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing is the only way the middle class in the developed world can help creation of a middle class of entrepreneurs in the developing world
lenders.occupational_info: Make the brains of computers

lenders.name: McLain
lenders.loan_because: I want my sons to have a clearer picture of the world and our responsibility to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a large internet site for a government agency.

lenders.name: MICHELE
lenders.loan_because: Best way to spend my money, is by helping others - $25.00 loans will not break my bank, but can significantly help another person

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being successful at what i do and love helping others get there too.
lenders.occupational_info: At work i create drawings and maps that help with the construction of water related projects.  I also volunteer at a local animal shelter and with a women's organization.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I have met a lot of good people who just need a little bit of help to start them on a journey of producivity and success.
lenders.occupational_info: I have to discover ways to raise money for a university.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: As I have been helped in the past  so do I want to help others.

lenders.name: Hayward UMC
lenders.loan_because: We want to be good neighbors
lenders.occupational_info: We are a church committed to loving God and loving our neighbors (near and far).

lenders.name: Prashant
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: It's fun!

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell print services to companies in eastern North America

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's addictive!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher and a craftsperson.

lenders.name: Lexy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a little help! This is a great program & I'm very honored to be apart of it.

lenders.name: Ion Channel Media Group
lenders.loan_because: it is a much, much better use of our money than having it sit in a bank account earning paltry interest.
lenders.occupational_info: We connect buyers of scientific products with businesses and also provide free information to scientists through our databases.

lenders.name: Clayton
lenders.loan_because: Helping people that need help is the greatest thing a person can do.  If we would all take the time to help someone, the world would be a much better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mechanic in the US Air Force.  I serve my country and try to help out anyone that requires assistance.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of encouraging women's businesses and independence.  This is something I can do very easily that has a direct impact on someone's life.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: such a small amount of money for me can make such a huge difference for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. federal government.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: It is my chance to help folks out.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I can afford it right now.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe that blessED people bless people.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise auto-manufacturing employees to verify that the products they build meet quality standards for the corporation.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 9th American History.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help other people who aren't as fortunate as me.
lenders.occupational_info: currently learning to become a chemistry teacher

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for all I have and want to help others

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is my duty to help others accomplish their dreams and goals, just as others have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I dream of a world where everyone is granted the opportunity to better themselves and their communities without the worry of too limited resources.

lenders.name: Robin & Ray
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who struggle to make ends meet in this world
lenders.occupational_info: work on a computer pulling data for reports and Office manager

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: It`s the right thing to do.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am without help.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the world and met the most interesting people in some of the smallest countries. I enjoy being able to help others in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly work in non-commercial television, educational and history subjects.

lenders.name: Adjabeng
lenders.loan_because: I know what helping others can do to improve lives. I grew up in Ghana. I love to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct new drug discovery research.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I want to return the same kind of generosity and trust that's been given to me.

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: its a good way to give back!

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: as an entrepreneur I have better control over my destiny and I hope that this small amount of money will be of a big benefit to fellow entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage real estate properties and have my own business.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's a good thing to help others get their business together.
lenders.occupational_info: I make records with independent musicians and run a recording studio.

lenders.name: Mike & Christina
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the love of Jesus by giving back what God has blessed us with.

lenders.name: Bert
lenders.loan_because: Money should not be a limiting factor
lenders.occupational_info: Vice President for Finance

lenders.name: Tisha & Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lives. I feel so blessed with all that I have. It's so important to give back & bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the greatest job in the world ! Taking care of my 10 year old twins & instilling in them to be the best they can be! & most of all to find your true purpose in LIFE !!!

lenders.name: Jolene
lenders.loan_because: I care and love everyone!
lenders.occupational_info: I produce and host my own cooking show on the internet. I am a comedian and try to bring laughter and love to the world!

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: It is important to give back for all that you have been given.

lenders.name: Dinarda
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in a very poor country and I experienced first hand what a big difference a loan makes for these people. What might be just a little bit of money for us, in a third world country it means hope and opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the technology department  of a multinational bank. Mostly I write functional specifications documents for the proprietary applications that my department builds.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in life to have a wonderful family and a successful career. I believe very strongly that every single human being on this planet deserves the same opportunities that I have had.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I received loans to pay for college.  This gave me the opportunity to better my circumstances.  I want to pass that opportunity onto someone else...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales representative for a major IT Corporation.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I'm fascinated by this ability Kiva gives us to connect to people. I don’t have much but at least once a month I try to find another $25 to put into the Kiva kitty. .

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because:
He has showed you, O man, what is good. 
       And what does the LORD require of you? 
       To act justly and to love mercy 
       and to walk humbly with your God. Michah 6:8
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that groups that teach professional education courses meet specific regulations.

lenders.name: Michal
lenders.loan_because: I want to make an investment in the betterment of the world and I am fascinated by seeing what others do around the globe and excited to see them succeed!
lenders.occupational_info:
I help with scientific research into TB, Cystic Fibrosis, AIDS, and such.
I'm also active with the Green Party in my state and community and believe microcredit/lending to be an embodiment of several of our 10 Key Values, particularly Community-based Economics, Global Responsibility and Sustainability

lenders.name: Kika
lenders.loan_because: I loan for the sheer satisfaction of helping others…
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. I try my best to make magazines, books, packaging, etc look as appealing as possible to the public :)

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair computers that people are having problems with.

lenders.name: Dwayne
lenders.loan_because: I can....
lenders.occupational_info: I design equipment to make pharmaceuticals (medicine).

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: I believe one person's contribution can make a difference. When friends join together great things can be accomplished!

lenders.name: Angali
lenders.loan_because:
My husband was a US Army Major and was killed in action over a year ('07) ago in Afghanistan. He was always thinking of ways to help the people of Afghanistan rebuild their lives and country. I am so proud of him. 

I do this in honor of Hank Ofeciar (my husband) to help budding business people and entrepreneurs improve their lives, family and community. Hank believed in helping people who helped themselves....hardworking people like these entrepreneurs...they deserve all the support and help we can give them. Something so small creates such a big impact for someone half way around the world.

lenders.name: Chuck & Joe
lenders.occupational_info: We both work in the nonprofit sector in the US. Joe helps hard to employee individuals get the training needed to secure employment and Chuck works with US based foundations and other grantmaking programs.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: As Christians, my husband and I believe in social justice and in having a global impact.  Loaning money to those who want to improve their lot in life is a small way we can invest in the global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a software product that makes it easier to get information on cellular phones.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I feel my vocation in life is to help people who are less fortunate than I am. It gives me great joy in helping people who really want to make something of their lives. There is something so powerful in giving. I will continue to be a Kiva lender for as long as I live.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in helping people who genuinely want to work and support themselves without expecting handouts

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I care about helping others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the aerospace industry.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It is also an opportunity for me to support others with engaging their opportunities for growth and/or development.
lenders.occupational_info: I predominantly work with commercial organizations to establish and maintain information security practices that are used to protect electronic data environments.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping women help themselves.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to have been given the help and opportunities I have needed in life.  I want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: it just doesn't make any sense to not loan.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to society
